description: Snake illustration, ink on paper, illustration for Magazy Wizje, 2019

A series of posters created for the Rosa Vertov shoegaze band. The project explores the similarities in the organic structure and physicality of plants and the human body, blurring the boundaries between nature and human experience. It blends natural forms with eerie interconnected fragility and uncanny vitality.

Poster for a benefit event Podróżnych Ugościć x Turnus fest, featuring music, food, and a card tournament organized by non – profit organization Podróżnych Ugościć. The event took place at Turnus na Wolskiej, a café and art gallery in Warsaw.

Visual indentity (poster, brochure, web graphics) for the Hope/nature dies last art exhibition in Gallery CSW Łaźnia in Gdynia in 2024. The project centers on the issue of fish die-offs and the ecological disaster in the Oder River in 2022, envisioning a funeral ceremony as a response to these events.

alt: From the river to the sea
description: Poster and T-shirt design for a benefit fair self-organized event. During the event, we screen printed design onto T-shirts and other textilies. Proceeds were donated to Palestine Children’s Relief Found.
Cover design and illustrations for the poetry book Trójkącie by Iryna Zahladko, published by SDK Warsaw
Poster for event organized by Animalia Collective, 2023

zine Prophecy published by local risoprinthing press and publisher Oficyna Peryferie. Prophecy is a story of a tarot reading in which mysterious creatures face an inevitable fate. It delves into the co-creation of reality through the mutual experience of all living things, emphasizing the intercon nectedness and coexistence of humans and non-human beings.
